summary.span: 代表世界的任意時區。

span.span: Represents any time zone in the world.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時區是使用相同時間的地理區域。A time zone is a geographical region in which the same time is used. 類別透過提供顯著的增強功能類別，可提供有限的功能。The class offers significant enhancements over the class, which provides only limited functionality. 類別會辨識只當地時區，並可以轉換為國際標準時間 (UTC) 與本地時間之間的時間。The class recognizes only the local time zone, and can convert times between Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and local time. A物件可代表任何時區、 和方法類別可以用來將一個時區中的時間轉換成任何其他時區中相對應的時間。A object can represent any time zone, and methods of the class can be used to convert the time in one time zone to the corresponding time in any other time zone. 成員類別支援下列作業：The members of the class support the following operations: - 正在擷取已定義作業系統的時區。Retrieving a time zone that is already defined by the operating system. - 列舉系統可用的時區。Enumerating the time zones that are available on a system. - 轉換不同的時區之間的時間。Converting times between different time zones. - 建立新的時區，尚未定義作業系統。Creating a new time zone that is not already defined by the operating system. - 序列化時區，供日後擷取。Serializing a time zone for later retrieval. > [!NOTE] > 執行個體類別是不變。An instance of the class is immutable. 一旦具現化物件，就無法修改其值。Once an object has been instantiated, its values cannot be modified. 您無法具現化物件使用`new`關鍵字。You cannot instantiate a object using the `new` keyword. 相反地，您必須呼叫其中一個靜態成員類別下表所示。Instead, you must call one of the static members of the class shown in the following table. |靜態成員名稱Static member name|描述Description| |------------------------|-----------------| | 方法 method|從應用程式提供的資料，請建立自訂時區。Creates a custom time zone from application-supplied data.| | 方法 method|具現化時區識別項為基礎的系統登錄中定義的時區。Instantiates a time zone defined in the system registry based on the zone's identifier.| | 方法 method|還原序列化字串值來重新建立先前序列化物件。Deserializes a string value to re-create a previously serialized object.| | 方法 method|傳回可列舉的物件，代表所有本機系統可用的時區。Returns an enumerable of objects that represents all time zones that are available on the local system.| | 屬性 property|具現化代表本地時區的物件。Instantiates a object that represents the local time zone.| | 屬性 property|具現化代表 UTC 時區的物件。Instantiates a object that represents the UTC zone.| 您可以使用方法來建立本機系統登錄中未定義的時區。You can use the method to create a time zone that is not defined in the local system registry. 然後您可以使用時區物件的資訊儲存為字串時，可以儲存至應用程式存取某種形式的屬性。You can then use the property to save the time zone object's information as a string, which can be stored in some form that is accessible to the application. 您可以使用方法，將序列化的字串轉換回物件。You can use the method to convert a serialized string back to a object.

summary.span: 取得目前時區標準時間與國際標準時間 (UTC) 的時差。

span.span: Gets the time difference between the current time zone's standard time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

value.span: 表示目前時區標準時間與國際標準時間 (UTC) 時差的物件。

span.span: An object that indicates the time difference between the current time zone's standard time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的時間範圍屬性範圍 14 個小時 （14 小時晚於 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時區） 到-14 小時 （14 小時 utc 的時區為準）。The time span returned by the property can range from 14 hours (for a time zone that is 14 hours ahead of Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)) to -14 hours (for a time zone that is 14 hours behind UTC). 晚於 UTC 的時區具有正數的位移。是 utc 的時區具有負數的位移。Time zones that are ahead of UTC have a positive offset; time zones that are behind UTC have a negative offset. 值會以整數分鐘數表示。The value is represented as a whole number of minutes. 它不能包含小數的分鐘數。It cannot include a fractional number of minutes. > [!NOTE] > 因為屬性物件而非物件，類別適用於單一位移與 utc 之間所有時區的調整。Because is a property of the object rather than the object, the class applies a single offset from UTC to all of a time zone's adjustments. 若要反映已經修改，其與 UTC 相差的時區，您必須建立新的時區使用方法。To reflect a time zone that has modified its offset from UTC, you must create a new time zone using the method. 屬性不同於方法，以下列方式：The property differs from the method in the following ways: - 屬性會傳回 UTC 時區的標準時間; 之間的差異方法傳回時間 UTC 時區的時間，在特定時間點之間的差異。The property returns the difference between UTC and the time zone's standard time; the method returns the difference between UTC and the time zone's time at a particular point in time. - 方法會反映應用程式調整規則的時區;屬性則否。The method reflects the application of any adjustment rules to the time zone; the property does not. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來顯示當地時間與國際標準時間 (UTC) 之間的差異。The following example uses the property to display the difference between the local time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/CS/TimeZone2_Examples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/VB/TimeZone2_Examples.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的時區資料包括當地時區、 國際標準時間 (UTC) 時區，以及藉由使用下列方法擷取任何時區資料和。Cached time zone data includes data on the local time zone, the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) zone, and any time zones that are retrieved by using methods such as and . 您可能會呼叫方法，以減少記憶體專用於應用程式的快取的時區資訊或以反映在本機系統時區已變更的事實。You might call the method to reduce the memory devoted to the application's cache of time zone information or to reflect the fact that the local system's time zone has changed. 建議您不要儲存在本機與 UTC 時區的參考。Storing references to the local and UTC time zones is not recommended. 若要在呼叫之後方法，這些物件的變數會是未定義不再參考的物件或。After the call to the method, these object variables will be undefined objects that are no longer references to or . 例如，下列程式碼中，第二個呼叫方法會擲回因為`local`變數就不再被視為等於。For example, in the following code, the second call to the method throws an because the `local` variable is no longer considered equal to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行轉換時方法適用於任何調整規則生效的`destinationTimeZone`時區。When performing the conversion, the method applies any adjustment rules in effect in the `destinationTimeZone` time zone. 這個多載方法會判斷來源時區的值從`dateTime`參數的屬性，如下表所示。This overload of the method determines the source time zone from the value of the `dateTime` parameter's property, as the following table shows. |Kind 屬性值Kind property value|來源時區Source time zone|方法的行為Method behavior| |-------------------------|----------------------|---------------------| |||將本地時間轉換為時間`destinationTimeZone`。Converts the local time to the time in `destinationTimeZone`.| |||將轉換為國際標準時間 (UTC) 時間`destinationTimeZone`。Converts Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to the time in `destinationTimeZone`.| ||假設為。Assumed to be .|將本地時間轉換為時間`destinationTimeZone`。Converts the local time to the time in `destinationTimeZone`.| 屬性傳回之值會設定為下表所示。The property of the returned value is set as shown in the following table. |條件Condition|傳回類型的屬性值Returned Kind property value| |---------------|----------------------------------| |`destinationTimeZone` 為 。The `destinationTimeZone` is .|| |`destinationTimeZone` 為 。The `destinationTimeZone` is .|| |所有其他日期和時間值和目標時區。All other date and time values and destination time zones.|| 如果值`dateTime`參數是模稜兩可的當地時間，將它解譯為標準時間。If the value of the `dateTime` parameter is an ambiguous local time, it is interpreted as a standard time. 如果`dateTime`參數是無效的本機時間，這個方法會擲回。If the `dateTime` parameter is an invalid local time, this method throws an . 如果轉換`dateTime`產生的日期和時間值早於或更晚，這個方法會傳回或分別。If the conversion of `dateTime` results in a date and time value that is earlier than or later than , this method returns or , respectively. 您也可以藉由呼叫轉換或 UTC和方法。You can also convert to or from UTC by calling the and methods. ## Examples 下列範例會美國和加拿大的美加東部時區中，將日期和時間值的陣列轉換為時間。The following example converts an array of date and time values to times in the Eastern Time zone of the U.S. and Canada. 它會顯示來源時區取決於來源的屬性，值。It shows that the source time zone depends on the property of the source value. 它也說明了方法會調整時區列入考量，因為來源和目的地時區中發生上午 2:00 的時區調整It also illustrates that the method takes time zone adjustments into account, because a time zone adjustment occurs in both the source and destination time zones at 2:00 A.M. 在 2010 年 11 月 7日日。on November 7, 2010. do not need to know whether the converted time is standard or daylight saving time. 方法會判斷來源時區的值從`dateTime`參數的屬性，如下表所示。The method determines the source time zone from the value of the `dateTime` an ambiguous local time, it is interpreted as a standard time. 如果`dateTime`參數是無效的本機時間，這個方法會擲回。If the `dateTime` parameter is an invalid local time, this method throws an . 如果轉換`dateTime`產生的日期和時間值早於或更晚，這個方法會傳回或分別。If the conversion of `dateTime` results in a date and time value that is earlier than or later than , this method returns or , respectively. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法適合用來建立具有沒有進行調整 （也就是不支援日光節約時間的時間區域） 的時區。This overload of the method is suitable for creating a time zone that has no adjustments (that is, a time zone that does not support daylight saving time). 若要定義包括調整日光節約時間的時區，請使用或方法。To define a time zone that includes adjustments for daylight saving time, use either the or the method. 下表顯示提供給參數之間的關聯性方法和屬性方法呼叫所傳回的物件。The following table shows the relationship between the parameters that are provided to the method and the properties of the object that are returned by the method call. |CreateCustomTimeZone parameterCreateCustomTimeZone parameter|TimeZoneInfo 屬性TimeZoneInfo property| |------------------------------------|---------------------------| |`id`|| |`baseUtcOffset`|| |`displayName`|| |`standardDisplayName`|| 一般而言，時區標準時間名稱和其識別碼都相同。Typically, the time zone's standard time name and its identifier are the same. 不過，時區的識別項的長度不可超過 32 個字元。However, the length of the time zone's identifier should not exceed 32 characters. 將字串傳遞至`displayName`參數會遵循標準相當的格式。The string passed to the `displayName` parameter follows a fairly standard format. 顯示名稱的第一個部分是國際標準時間的縮寫 GMT （格林威治標準時間），加上括號表示時區的基底位移。The first portion of the display name is the time zone's base offset from Coordinated Universal Time, which is indicated by the acronym GMT (for Greenwich Mean Time), enclosed in parentheses. 此事件後面是可識別時區本身，或者一個或多個城市、 地區或國家 （地區） 的時區，或兩者的字串。This is followed by a string that identifies the time zone itself, or one or more of the cities, regions, or countries in the time zone, or both. 例如: For example: ``` (GMT+02:00) Athens, Beirut, Istanbul, Minsk (GMT-02:00) Mid-Atlantic (GMT-07:00) Mountain Time (US & Canada) ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立自訂時區茂森和 Holme 槽的區域南極洲。The following example creates a custom time zone for the Mawson and Holme Bay regions of Antarctica. 然後，它會顯示新時區的時間轉換為本地時間的結果。It then displays the result of converting the local time to the time in the new time zone. （格林威治標準時間），加上括號表示時區的基底位移。The first portion of the display name is the time zone's base offset from Coordinated Universal Time, which is indicated by the acronym GMT (for Greenwich Mean Time), enclosed in parentheses. 此事件後面是可識別時區本身，或者一個或多個城市、 地區或國家 （地區） 的時區，或兩者的字串。This is followed by a string that identifies the time zone itself, or one or more of the cities, regions, or countries in the time zone, or both. 例如: For example: ``` (GMT+02:00) Athens, Beirut, Istanbul, Minsk (GMT-02:00) Mid-Atlantic (GMT-07:00) Mountain Time (US & Canada) ``` `baseUtcOffset`參數定義自訂時區位移與國際標準時間 (UTC) 時區的調整規則的所有。The `baseUtcOffset` parameter defines the custom time zone's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for all of the time zone's adjustment rules. 換句話說，物件模型會假設 UTC 的時區時差常數存留期時間區域內，且有獨立於特定的調整規則。In other words, the object model assumes that the time zone's offset from UTC is constant throughout the life of the time zone, and exists independent of particular adjustment rules. 若要反映已變更其位移的 UTC 的時區，您必須建立新的時區物件。To reflect a time zone that has changed its offset from UTC, you must create a new time zone object. 時區調整規則的定義方式執行下列動作：A time zone's adjustment rules are defined by doing the following: 1. 呼叫或方法定義的起點和終點轉換每個調整規則的時間。Calling either the or the method to define the starting and ending transition time for each adjustment rule. 2. 呼叫針對每個調整規則的方法。Calling the method for each adjustment rule. 3. 調整規則指派給陣列可以當做傳遞`adjustmentRules`參數。Assigning the adjustment rules to an array that can be passed as the `adjustmentRules` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會建立自訂時區 Palmer 站台和 Anvers conditions at run time. 下表顯示提供給參數之間的關聯性方法和成員方法呼叫所傳回的物件。The following table shows the relationship between the parameters that are provided to the method and the members of the object that are returned the method if `disableDaylightSavingTime` is `false`; an empty array returned by the method if `disableDaylightSavingTime` is `true`.| |`disableDaylightSavingTime`|不。Not .| 一般而言，時區標準時間名稱和其識別碼都相同。Typically, the time zone's standard time name and its identifier are the same. 不過，時區的識別項的長度不可超過 32 個字元。However, the length of the time zone's identifier should not exceed 32 characters. 將字串傳遞至`displayName`參數會遵循標準相當的格式。The string passed to the `displayName` parameter follows a fairly standard format. 顯示名稱的第一個部分是國際標準時間的縮寫 GMT （格林威治標準時間），加上括號表示時區的基底位移。The first portion of the display name is the time zone's base offset from Coordinated Universal Time, which is indicated by the acronym GMT (for Greenwich Mean Time), enclosed in parentheses. 此事件後面是可識別時區本身，或者一個或多個城市、 地區或國家 （地區） 的時區，或兩者的字串。This is followed by a string that identifies the time zone itself, or one or more of the cities, regions, or countries in the time zone, or both. 例如: For example: ``` (GMT+02:00) Athens, Beirut, Istanbul, Minsk (GMT-02:00) Mid-Atlantic (GMT-07:00) Mountain Time (US & Canada) ``` 時區調整規則的定義方式執行下列動作：A time zone's adjustment rules are defined by doing the following: 1. 呼叫或方法來定義開始和結束每個調整規則的轉換規則。Calling either the or the method to define the starting and ending transition rules for each adjustment rule. 2. 呼叫針對每個調整規則的方法。Calling the method for each adjustment rule. 3. 調整規則指派給陣列可以當做傳遞`adjustmentRules`參數。Assigning the adjustment rules to an array that can be passed as the `adjustmentRules` parameter. 如果`disableDaylightSavingTime`參數是`false`，此方法的作業等同於多載。If `disableDaylightSavingTime` parameter is `false`, the operation of this method is identical to the overload. 如果`disableDaylightSavingTime`是`true`，傳回的物件包括沒有調整規則和屬性其值為空字串。If `disableDaylightSavingTime` is `true`, the returned object includes no adjustment rules and a property whose value is an empty string. ## Examples 下列範例會建立自訂時區 Palmer 站台和 Anvers 島南極洲。The following example creates a custom time zone for the Palmer station and Anvers Island in Antarctica. 它會設定`disableDaylightSavingTime`參數在呼叫方法`true`。It sets the `disableDaylightSavingTime` parameter in the call to the method to `true`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據與 Windows 作業系統一起安裝的文化特性當地語系化的顯示名稱。The display name is localized based on the culture installed with the Windows operating system. A屬性其值不是或`null`不一定表示時區支援日光節約時間。A property whose value is not or `null` does not necessarily indicate that the time zone supports daylight saving time. 若要判斷是否時區支援日光節約時間，請檢查的值及其屬性。To determine whether the time zone supports daylight saving time, check the value of its property. 在大部分情況下，時區登錄中定義的屬性不是或`null`。In most cases, the property of time zones defined in the registry is not or `null`. 不過，自訂時區屬性可以設定為。However, the property of custom time zones can be set to . 建立自訂時區時，發生這種的情況或多載而`disableDaylightSavingTime`參數是`true`。This occurs when custom time zones are created by the or the overload and the `disableDaylightSavingTime` parameter is `true`. 因此，您的程式碼應該永遠不會假設的值屬性不是`null`或空白。Therefore, your code should never assume that the value of the property is not `null` or empty. 屬性就相當於屬性類別。The property is equivalent to the property of the class. ## Examples 下列範例會定義方法，名為`DisplayDateWithTimeZoneName`使用方法，以判斷是否要顯示的時區標準時間名稱或日光節約時間名稱。The following example defines a method named `DisplayDateWithTimeZoneName` that uses the method to determine whether to display a time zone's standard time name or daylight saving time name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據與 Windows 作業系統一起安裝的文化特性當地語系化的顯示名稱。The display name is localized based on the culture installed with the Windows operating system. Windows 系統時區的時區顯示名稱會遵循相當標準格式。Time zone display names for Windows system time zones follow a fairly standard format. 顯示名稱的第一個部分是國際標準時間的縮寫 GMT （格林威治標準時間），加上括號表示時區的基底位移。The first portion of the display name is the time zone's base offset from Coordinated Universal Time, which is indicated by the acronym GMT (for Greenwich Mean Time), enclosed in parentheses. 時間 Coordinated Universal time，GMT 縮略字，沒有位移加上括弧。For Coordinated Universal Time, the GMT acronym with no offset is enclosed in parentheses. 此事件後面是可識別時區或一或多個城市、 地區或國家 （地區） 時區的字串。This is followed by a string that identifies the time zone or one or more of the cities, regions, or countries in the time zone. 例如: For example: ``` (GMT) Greenwich Mean Time : Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, London (GMT+02:00) Athens, Beirut, Istanbul, Minsk (GMT-02:00) Mid-Atlantic (GMT-07:00) Mountain Time (US & Canada) ``` ## Examples 下列範例會擷取物件，代表本地時區，並將其顯示名稱、 標準時間名稱和日光節約時間名稱的輸出。The following example retrieves a object that represents the local time zone and outputs its display name, standard time name, and daylight saving time name. 輸出會顯示在美國太平洋時區系統太平洋標準時區。The output is displayed for a system in the U.S. Pacific Standard Time zone. remarks.format: ## Remarks `id`參數必須正確對應到時區的登錄機碼的長度，但不是在案例中，成功的相符項目發生; 也就是比較的`id`時區識別項不區分大小寫。The `id` parameter must correspond exactly to the time zone's registry key in length, but not in case, for a successful match to occur; that is, the comparison of `id` with time zone identifiers is case-insensitive. 如果您想要擷取的部分符合結果為基礎的時區物件，您可以撰寫自訂工作的唯讀集合的程序所傳回的物件方法。If you want to retrieve time zone objects based on partial matches, you can write custom procedures that work with the read-only collection of objects returned by the method. 嘗試比對`id`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time 區域的分支在 Windows XP 和 Windows Vista 登錄子機碼名稱。 tries to match `id` to the subkey names of the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones branch of the registry under Windows XP and Windows Vista. 此分支不一定會包含時區識別項的完整清單。This branch does not necessarily contain a comprehensive list of time zone identifiers. 如果應用程式所需，您可以建立特定的時區是透過呼叫其中一個多載方法或呼叫還原序列化物件，代表所需的時區。If required by an application, you can create a particular time zone either by calling one of the overloads of the method or by calling to deserialize a object that represents the required time zone. 不過，這些方法呼叫所建立的時區會對不在登錄中，且無法使用擷取方法。However, time zones created by these method calls are not included in the registry and cannot be retrieved using the method. 這些自訂的時區可以存取所傳回的物件參考只能透過或方法呼叫。These custom time zones can be accessed only through the object reference returned by the or method call. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來擷取東京標準時間區域。The following example uses the method to retrieve the Tokyo Standard Time zone. 這東京中轉換為時間的本地時間，並判斷它是否東京標準時間或東京日光節約時間，然後使用物件。This object is then used to convert the local time to the time in Tokyo and to determine whether it is Tokyo Standard Time or Tokyo Daylight Time. summary.span: 擷取會套用至目前 物件的 物件陣列。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法擷取陣列物件。The method retrieves an array of objects. 陣列中的每個物件會定義有效的開始和結束日期的時區調整，以及其差異 （精確調整，讓時間變更的數量）。Each object in the array defines the effective start and end date of that time zone adjustment, as well as its delta (the exact amount by which the adjustment causes the time to change). 此外，兩個屬性會傳回定義每個與標準時間的年度轉換發生時的物件。In addition, two properties return objects that define when each annual transition to and from standard time occurs. 如果時區有多項調整規則，它們的一般順序從最早 （位於索引 0） 到最新 (位於索引– 1)。If a time zone has multiple adjustment rules, they are generally ordered from earliest (at index 0) to latest (at index – 1). 如果時區有沒有調整規則，方法會傳回空陣列 (陣列其為零)。If a time zone has no adjustment rules, the method returns an empty array (an array whose is zero). 所傳回的陣列元素的任何修改方法不會反映在屬於特定的時區調整規則。Any modifications to the elements of the array returned by the method are not reflected in the adjustment rules that belong to a particular time zone. 若要修改的時區調整規則 （例如反映與日光節約時間歷程記錄轉換） 您必須使用適當的調整規則的宣告，建立新的時區而非修改現有。To modify a time zone's adjustment rules (such as to reflect its historical transition to and from daylight saving time) you must create a new time zone with the appropriate adjustment rules, rather than modify the existing one. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取所有的本機系統，並顯示完成資訊至主控台其調整規則中定義的時區。The following example retrieves all time zones that are defined on the local system and displays complete information about their adjustment rules to the console. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的確切行為取決於之間的關聯性屬性和物件，如下表所示。The precise behavior of this method depends on the relationship between the property and the object, as the following table shows. |TimeZoneInfo 物件類型TimeZoneInfo object type|Kind 屬性值Kind property value|行為Behavior| |------------------------------|-------------------------|--------------| || 或 or |傳回模稜兩可的時間位移`dateTime`。Returns ambiguous time offsets for `dateTime`.| |||將轉換`dateTime`本機時間，然後傳回該時間位移模稜兩可的時間。Converts `dateTime` to the local time, and then returns ambiguous time offsets for that time.| ||任何值。Any value.|擲回。Throws an .| |任何其他的時區。Any other time zone.| 或 or |將轉換`dateTime`至指定的時區，然後決定該時間是否模稜兩可。Converts `dateTime` to the specified time zone, and then determines whether that time is ambiguous.| |任何其他的時區。Any other time zone.||決定是否`dateTime`模稜兩可在指定的時區。Determines whether `dateTime` is ambiguous in the specified time zone.| 順序是未定義的這個方法所傳回陣列中的物件。The order of objects in the array returned by this method is undefined. 不過，您可以判斷哪個項目代表時區的標準時間從藉由比較其值的時區位移屬性。However, you can determine which element represents an offset from the time zone's standard time by comparing its value with the time zone's property. 若要對應模稜兩可的時間的時區標準時間，請參閱[如何： 解決模稜兩可的時間](~/docs/standard/datetime/resolve-ambiguous-times.md)。To map an ambiguous time to a time zone's standard time, see [How to: Resolve Ambiguous Times](~/docs/standard/datetime/resolve-ambiguous-times.md). ## Examples 下列範例會定義方法，名為`ShowPossibleUtcTimes`使用方法來對應至對應的國際標準時間 (UTC) 時間是可能模稜兩可的時間。The following example defines a method named `ShowPossibleUtcTimes` that uses the method to map an ambiguous time to its possible corresponding Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) times. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets/cs/System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets/vb/System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets.vb#1)] 呼叫此方法可以再使用程式碼如下所示：The method can then be called using code such as the following: [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets/cs/System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets/vb/System.TimeZone2.GetAmbiguousTimeOffsets.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的確切行為取決於之間的關聯性屬性`dateTimeOffset`參數和物件。The precise behavior of this method depends on the relationship between the property of the `dateTimeOffset` parameter and the object. 如果值屬性會對應至目前時區的可能位移與國際標準時間 (UTC) 的日期和時間，此方法會傳回可能位移。If the value of the property corresponds to the current time zone's possible offsets from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for that date and time, the method returns the possible offsets. 否則，它會將轉換`dateTimeOffset`目前的時區，然後再傳回可能的位移的時間的日期和時間。Otherwise, it converts `dateTimeOffset` to the time in the current time zone, and then returns the possible offsets of that date and time. 順序是未定義的這個方法所傳回陣列中的物件。The order of objects in the array returned by this method is undefined. 不過，您可以判斷哪個項目代表時區的標準時間從藉由比較其值的時區位移屬性。However, you can determine which element represents an offset from the time zone's standard time by comparing its value with the time zone's property. 若要對應模稜兩可的時間的時區標準時間，請參閱[如何： 解決模稜兩可的時間](~/docs/standard/datetime/resolve-ambiguous-times.md)。To map an ambiguous time to a time zone's standard time, see [How to: Resolve Ambiguous Times](~/docs/standard/datetime/resolve-ambiguous-times.md).

summary.span: 傳回有關本機系統上哪些資訊可用之所有時區的排序集合。

span.span: Returns a sorted collection of all the time zones about which information is available on the local system.

returns.span: 物件的唯讀集合。

span.span: A read-only collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從登錄機碼 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time 區域的子機碼來擷取所有可用的時區資訊。The method retrieves all available time zone information from the subkeys of the registry's HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones key. 如果無法成功地擷取並剖析為個別的特定字串屬性的值物件，這個方法會設定其值為空字串 ("")。If it is unable to successfully retrieve and parse values for particular string properties of individual objects, this method sets their value to an empty string (""). > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法傳回的集合登錄中定義的時區的物件。The method returns a collection of objects only for time zones defined in the registry. 它不包含使用的多載所建立的時區方法。It does not include time zones created using the overloads of the method. 這些是只可透過存取時區建立方法所傳回的物件參考。These are accessible only through the object reference returned by the time zone creation method. 這個方法所傳回的集合排序以 UTC 的位移和時區具有相同的 UTC 時差，以使用目前文化特性的顯示名稱。The collection returned by this method is sorted by UTC offset and, for time zones that have the same UTC offset, by the display name using the current culture. 顯示名稱的相關資訊，請參閱。For information about the display name, see . 這個方法所傳回的物件支援介面，這表示，它可以可重複使用`foreach`（C# 中） 或`For Each…Next`（在 Visual Basic) 陳述式。The object returned by this method supports the interface, which means that it can be iterated using the `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each…Next` (in Visual Basic) statements. 迴圈的每個反覆項目提供下一個集合中的物件。Each iteration of the loop provides the next object in the collection. 集合物件代表本機電腦上定義的時區，則不需要提供在所有的時段內所有時區的完整資訊。The collection of objects represents time zones defined on the local computer; it does not necessarily provide complete information for all time zones during all time periods. 如果您的應用程式需要在本機電腦上找不到時區，您可以建立使用的多載的自訂時區方法。If your application requires time zones not found on the local computer, you can create custom time zones using the overloads of the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立沒有調整規則的時區](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-without-adjustment-rules.md)和[How to： 建立有調整規則的時區區域](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md)。For more information, see [How to: Create Time Zones Without Adjustment Rules](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-without-adjustment-rules.md) and [How to: Create Time Zones with Adjustment Rules](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md). 您也可以判斷個別的時區是否已定義在本機電腦上藉由呼叫方法並提供您想要擷取做為參數的時區的識別項。You can also determine whether an individual time zone is defined on the local computer by calling the method and providing the identifier of the time zone you want to retrieve as a parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取代表電腦上所定義的時區的時區物件的集合，並將其資訊寫入至文字檔。The following example retrieves a collection of time zone objects that represent the time zones defined on a computer and writes information about them to a text file. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/CS/getsystemtimezones1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/VB/getsystemtimezones1.vb#6)] [!code-powershell[System.TimeZone2.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/powershell/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TimeZone2.Class/PS/Timezone2_Examples.ps1)]

summary.span: 計算這個時區與國際標準時間 (UTC) 在特定日期和時間的位移或差異。

span.span: Calculates the offset or difference between the time in this time zone and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for a particular date and time.

returns.span: 物件，表示兩個時區間的時差。

span.span: An object that indicates the time difference between the two time zones.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的時間範圍包括任何差異，因為目前的時區調整規則的應用程式。The returned time span includes any differences due to the application of adjustment rules to the current time zone. 不同於屬性，傳回 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時區的標準時間的差異，因此，不會考慮調整規則的帳戶。It differs from the property, which returns the difference between Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and the time zone's standard time and, therefore, does not take adjustment rules into account. 如果`dateTime`參數的屬性沒有對應到時區的物件，這個方法會執行傳回結果之前必要的轉換。If the `dateTime` parameter's property does not correspond to the time zone object, this method performs the necessary conversion before returning a result. 例如，可能發生這屬性是但時區物件不是當地時區。For example, this can occur if the property is but the time zone object is not the local time zone. 如果`dateTime`模稜兩可，或轉換後的時間是否模稜兩可，這個方法會解譯為標準時間的模稜兩可的時間。If `dateTime` is ambiguous, or if the converted time is ambiguous, this method interprets the ambiguous time as a standard time. 如果`dateTime`是無效的這個方法會傳回會反映 UTC 時區的標準時間之間差異的物件。If `dateTime` is invalid, this method returns a object that reflects the difference between UTC and the time zone's standard time. 方法是在作業類似方法類別。The method is similar in operation to the method of the class. ## Examples 下列範例說明使用方法不同的時區，並具有不同的日期值屬性值。The following example illustrates the use of the method with different time zones and with date values that have different property values. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.GetUtcOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.GetUtcOffset/cs/System.TimeZone2.GetUtcOffset.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.GetUtcOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.GetUtcOffset/vb/System.TimeZone2.GetUtcOffset.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得時區識別項。

span.span: Gets the time zone identifier.
The time zone identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時區識別項是索引鍵可唯一識別特定的時區字串。The time zone identifier is a key string that uniquely identifies a particular time zone. 在 Windows XP 和 Windows Vista 中，它會對應至登錄的 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time 區域分支的子機碼。In Windows XP and Windows Vista, it corresponds to the subkeys of the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zone branch of the registry. 可以將它傳遞為參數，以方法，以從登錄擷取特定的時區。It can be passed as a parameter to the method to retrieve a particular time zone from the registry. > [!IMPORTANT] > 雖然 Windows 登錄中的索引鍵名稱最多可有 255 個字元，但建議您將指派給自訂時區的識別項是 32 個字元或更少。Although a key name in the Windows registry can be a maximum of 255 characters, we recommend that an identifier that you assign to a custom time zone be 32 characters or fewer. 更長的識別項，就越有可能不正確的索引鍵名稱將會提供擷取它時。The longer the identifier, the greater the probability that an incorrect key name will be supplied when retrieving it. 值屬性通常是，但不是一定相同屬性。The value of the property is usually, but not always, identical to that of the property. 協調通用時區的識別項會使用 utc 格式。The identifier of the Coordinated Universal Time zone is UTC. ## Examples 下列範例會列出每個在本機電腦上定義的時區的識別項。The following example lists the identifier of each of the time zones defined on the local computer. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/CS/TimeZone2_Examples.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/VB/TimeZone2_Examples.vb#5)]

returns.span: 如果 參數模稜兩可，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the parameter is ambiguous; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模稜兩可的時間落在目前時區的時間範圍內。An ambiguous time falls within a range of times for the current time zone. 這表示它可以是標準時間或時間所產生的調整規則的應用程式。This means it can be either a standard time or a time that results from the application of an adjustment rule. 一般而言，時鐘設定為傳回標準時間日光節約時間時造成模稜兩可的時間。Typically, ambiguous times result when the clock is set to return to standard time from daylight saving time. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。See the Example section for an illustration. 國際標準時間 (UTC) 有任何模稜兩可的時間。兩者皆非的時間不支援日光節約時間的區域。Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) has no ambiguous times; neither do time zones that do not support daylight saving time. 因此，這些時區具有沒有調整規則和呼叫方法一律會傳回`false`。Therefore, these time zones have no adjustment rules and calls to the method always return `false`. 遵循日光節約時間的時區，這個方法的確切行為取決於之間的關聯性屬性和物件，如下表所示。For time zones that do observe daylight saving time, the precise behavior of this method depends on the relationship between the property and the object, as the following table shows. |TimeZoneInfo 物件類型TimeZoneInfo object type|Kind 屬性值Kind property value|行為Behavior| |------------------------------|-------------------------|--------------| || 或 or |決定是否`dateTime`參數模稜兩可。Determines whether the `dateTime` parameter is ambiguous.| |||將轉換`dateTime`的本機時間，然後決定該時間是否模稜兩可。Converts `dateTime` to the local time and then determines whether that time is ambiguous.| || 或 or |傳回 `false`。Returns `false`.| |||如果`dateTime`模稜兩可，假設標準時間、 將它轉換成 UTC，並傳回`false`。If `dateTime` is ambiguous, assumes it is a standard time, converts it to UTC, and returns `false`.| |任何其他的時區。Any other time zone.| 或 or |將轉換`dateTime`指定時區的時間，然後決定該時間是否模稜兩可。Converts `dateTime` to the time in the specified time zone and then determines whether that time is ambiguous.| |任何其他的時區。Any other time zone.||決定是否`dateTime`模稜兩可。Determines whether `dateTime` is ambiguous.| ## Examples 以太平洋時區為準，日光節約時間結束上午 2:00In the Pacific Time zone, daylight saving time ends at 2:00 A.M. 2007 年 11 月 4日日。on November 4, 2007. 下列範例會在一分鐘的時間間隔，從上午 12:59 傳遞時間The following example passes the time at one-minute intervals from 12:59 A.M. 2007 年 11 月 4日日到變成上午 2:01。on November 4, 2007, to 2:01 A.M. 在 2007 年 11 月 4 日，以方法物件，表示太平洋時區。on November 4, 2007, to the method of a object that represents the Pacific Time zone. 主控台輸出會指出所有時間，從上午 1:00The console output indicates that all times from 1:00 A.M. 2007 年 11 月 4日日到變成上午 1:59。on November 4, 2007, to 1:59 A.M. 在 2007 年 11 月 4 日，模稜兩可。on November 4, 2007, are ambiguous. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/CS/TimeZone2_Examples.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/VB/TimeZone2_Examples.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模稜兩可的時間落在目前時區的時間範圍內。An ambiguous time falls within a range of times for the current time zone. 這表示它可以是標準時間或時間所產生的調整規則的應用程式。This means that it can be either a standard time or a time that results from the application of an adjustment rule. 一般而言，時鐘設定為傳回標準時間日光節約時間時造成模稜兩可的時間。Typically, ambiguous times result when the clock is set to return to standard time from daylight saving time. 國際標準時間 (UTC) 有任何模稜兩可的時間。兩者皆非的時間不支援日光節約時間的區域。Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) has no ambiguous times; neither do time zones that do not support daylight saving time. 方法的確切行為取決於之間的關聯性屬性`dateTimeOffset`參數和目前的時區。The precise behavior of the method depends on the relationship between the property of the `dateTimeOffset` parameter and the current time zone. 如果值屬性有可能在與目前時區的 UTC 時差，此方法會判斷是否該日期和時間模稜兩可。If the value of the property is a possible offset from the UTC of the current time zone, the method determines whether that date and time is ambiguous. 否則，它會將轉換`dateTimeOffset`目前的時區的時間，然後決定是否該日期和時間模稜兩可。Otherwise, it converts `dateTimeOffset` to the time in the current time zone, and then determines whether that date and time is ambiguous.

|-------------------------|----------------------------|------------| ||`DateTimeKind.Local`|決定是否`dateTime`是日光節約時間。Determines whether `dateTime` is daylight saving time.| ||`DateTimeKind.Utc`|將轉換`dateTime`與國際標準時間 (UTC) 為當地時間，並判斷是否日光節約時間。Converts `dateTime` from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to local time and determines whether it is daylight saving time.| ||`DateTimeKind.Unspecified`|假設`dateTime`代表當地時間，並判斷它是否日光節約時間。Assumes that `dateTime` represents local time and determines whether it is daylight saving time.| ||`DateTimeKind.Local`、 `DateTimeKind.Unspecified`或 `DateTimeKind.Utc``DateTimeKind.Local`, `DateTimeKind.Unspecified`, or `DateTimeKind.Utc`|傳回`false`（UTC 不支援日光節約時間）。Returns `false` (UTC does not support daylight saving time).| |任何其他物件。Any other object.|`DateTimeKind.Local`|將本地時間轉換為相等的時間物件，然後決定是否後者日光節約時間。Converts the local time to the equivalent time of the object and then determines whether the latter is daylight saving time.| |任何其他物件。Any other object.|`DateTimeKind.Utc`|將轉換為相等的時間的 UTC物件，然後決定是否後者日光節約時間。Converts UTC to the equivalent time of the object and then determines whether the latter is daylight saving time.| |任何其他物件。Any other object.|`DateTimeKind.Unspecified`|決定是否`dateTime`是日光節約時間。Determines whether `dateTime` is daylight saving time.| 如果以表示時區物件不支援日光節約時間，此方法一定會傳回`false`。If the time zone standard time and returns `false` if its property is or . 如果屬性是，這個方法會選取正確模稜兩可的時間，表示是否為日光節約時間。If the property is , this method will select the correct ambiguous time and indicate whether it is a daylight saving time. 因為方法可以傳回`false`模稜兩可的時間和日期 （亦即，日期和時間表示的標準時間或為特定時區的日光節約時間）可以搭配方法方法，以判斷是否有可能時間日光節約時間。Because the method can return `false` for a date and time that is ambiguous (that is, a date and time that can represent either a standard time or a daylight saving time in a particular time zone), the method can be paired with the method to determine whether a time may be a daylight saving time. whether a date and time may be a daylight saving time. 如果此方法會傳回`false`、方法可以呼叫以判斷是否值是日光節約時間。If the method returns `false`, the method can be called to determine whether the value is a daylight saving remarks.format: ## Remarks 無效的時間落在目前的調整規則的應用程式因為無法對應以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 時區的時間範圍內。An invalid time falls within a range of times for the current time zone that cannot be mapped to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) due to the application of an adjustment rule. 一般而言，當時間到日光節約時間的下出現無效的時間。Typically, invalid times occur when the time moves ahead for daylight saving time. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。See the Example section for an illustration. 值屬性`dateTime`參數會影響是否`dateTime`表示無效的時間，如下表所示。The value of the property of the `dateTime` parameter affects whether `dateTime` represents an invalid time, as the following table shows. |DateTime.Kind 屬性DateTime.Kind property|TimeZoneInfo 物件 （如果適用）TimeZoneInfo object (if applicable)|行為Behavior| |----------------------------|-------------------------------------------|--------------| |||決定時間是否無效。Determines whether the time is invalid.| || 或非當地時區為準。 or a non-local time zone.|將轉換`dateTime`的時間物件並傳回`false`。Converts `dateTime` to the time of the object and returns `false`.| ||不適用。Not applicable.|假設`dateTime`的時間物件，並判斷它是否無效。Assumes `dateTime` is the time of the object and determines whether it is invalid.| ||不適用。Not applicable.|傳回 `false`。Returns `false`.| ## Examples 以太平洋時區為準，日光節約時間則是在上午 2:00 開始In the Pacific Time zone, daylight saving time begins at 2:00 A.M. 2006 年 4 月 2日日。on April 2, 2006. 下列程式碼會在一分鐘的時間間隔，從上午 1:59 傳遞時間The following code passes the time at one-minute intervals from 1:59 A.M. 2006 年 4 月 2日日到變成上午 3:01。on April 2, 2006, to 3:01 A.M. 2006 年 4 月 2 日到方法物件，表示太平洋時區。on April 2, 2006, to the method of a object that represents the Pacific Time zone. 主控台輸出會指出，所有時間上午 2:00The console output indicates that all times from 2:00 A.M. 2006 年 4 月 2日日到變成上午 2:59。on April 2, 2006, to 2:59 A.M. 2006 年 4 月 2 日，是無效的。on April 2, 2006, are invalid. summary.span: 取得代表本地時區的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the local time zone.
An object that represents the local time zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當地時區是程式碼執行所在的電腦上的時區。The local time zone is the time zone on the computer where the code is executing. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您一定要存取透過本地時區屬性，而不是指定本地時間區域以物件變數。You should always access the local time zone through the property rather than assigning the local time zone to a object variable. 這可防止物件變數，使其免於無效的呼叫所方法。This prevents the object variable from being invalidated by a call to the method. 所傳回物件屬性會反映的設定**自動調整日光節約時間的時鐘**核取方塊或**自動調整的日光節約時鐘時間**核取方塊，在控制台中**日期和時間**應用程式來進行 Windows XP 和 Windows Vista 中，分別。The object returned by the property reflects the setting of the **Automatically adjust clock for daylight saving changes** checkbox or the **Automatically adjust clock for Daylight Saving Time** checkbox in the Control Panel **Date and Time** application for Windows XP and Windows Vista, respectively. 如果未選取此核取方塊，本地時區的快取的副本就會包含任何日光節約時間資訊。If the checkbox is unchecked, the cached copy of the local time zone contains no daylight saving time information. 這表示：This means that: - 本地時區的方法會傳回長度為零的陣列。The local time zone's method returns an array whose length is zero. - 本地時區的屬性會傳回`false`。The local time zone's property returns `false`. - 當地時區具有任何模稜兩可或無效的時間 (所有呼叫或傳回`false`)。The local time zone has no ambiguous or invalid times (all calls to or return `false`). - 所有呼叫與個別的當地時間傳回 false。All calls to with individual local times return false. 這不為 true，不過，如果使用擷取的當地時區的參考方法。This is not true, however, if a reference to the local time zone is retrieved using the method. 屬性會對應至屬性類別。The property corresponds to the property of the class. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取物件，代表本地時區，並將其顯示名稱、 標準時間名稱和日光節約時間名稱的輸出。The following example retrieves a object that represents the local time zone and outputs its display name, standard time name, and daylight saving time name. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/CS/ShowTimeZoneNames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/VB/ShowTimeZoneNames1.vb#2)]

block.para:
在日期和時間，轉換[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]能夠辨識只有目前調整規則，它只適用於所有日期，包括下層日期 （亦即，日期早於目前的調整規則的開始日期）。
In converting dates and times, [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] recognizes only the current adjustment rule, which it applies to all dates, including down-level dates (that is, dates that are earlier than the starting date of the current adjustment rule).
在[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]，若要防止本機日期和時間資訊所提供從為分散在系統匣中，顯示的日期和時間資訊的物件所傳回物件屬性也適用於目前的調整規則為下層的日期。
On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)], to prevent local date and time information provided by the object from diverging from the date and time information displayed in the system tray, the object returned by the property also applies the current adjustment rule to down-level dates.
應用程式上執行[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]需要在過去精確的本地日期和時間計算使用，必須處理這種行為方法來擷取對應至本地時區的物件。
Applications running on [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] that require historically accurate local date and time calculations must work around this behavior by using the method to retrieve a object that corresponds to the local time zone.
下列範例提供一個實例的[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]美國太平洋時區中。
The following example provides an illustration for a [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] system in the U.S. Pacific Time zone.
因為所有的前三個方法會呼叫使用所傳回的本機時區屬性，它們適用於目前的時區調整規則 （這在 2007年進入效果） 為 2006 年的日期。
Because the first three method calls all use the local time zone returned by the property, they apply the current time zone adjustment rule (which went into effect in 2007) to a date in 2006.
提供轉換到日光節約時間發生的第二個星期日的年 3 月; 目前的調整規則上一個規則，在 2006 中，供轉換到日光節約時間發生在 4 月的第一個星期日，已在作用中。
The current adjustment rule provides for the transition to daylight saving time to occur on the second Sunday of March; the previous rule, which was in effect in 2006, provided for the transition to daylight saving time to occur on the first Sunday of April.
只有第四個方法呼叫，它會使用方法來擷取當地時區，精確地執行這個歷程記錄的日期和時間轉換。
Only the fourth method call, which uses the method to retrieve the local time zone, accurately performs this historical date and time conversion.

summary.span: 將目前的 物件轉換為序列化字串。

span.span: Converts the current object to a serialized string.

returns.span: 代表目前 物件的字串。

span.span: A string that represents the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不會定義在 Windows 系統登錄中時區所依賴的應用程式可以使用方法來具現化必要的時區，為物件。Applications that rely on time zones that are not typically defined in the registry of Windows systems can use the method to instantiate the necessary time zones as objects. 應用程式可以接著呼叫方法，將時區物件轉換成字串。The application can then call the method to convert the time zone object to a string. 物件應該也會儲存在應用程式在擷取時所需的位置。The object should also be stored in a location where the application can retrieve it when needed. 可能的位置包括：Possible locations include: - 登錄中。The registry. - 應用程式資源檔。An application resource file. - 外部檔案，例如文字檔案。An external file, such as a text file. ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試擷取南極洲/南極從本機系統時區。The following example tries to retrieve the Antarctica/South Pole time zone from the local system. 如果失敗，這個程式碼會嘗試從應用程式目錄中的文字檔擷取時區的相關資訊。If it fails, the code tries to retrieve information about the time zone from a text file in the application directory. 如果此嘗試失敗，程式碼會建立時區，並將其相關資訊寫入到文字檔案。If this attempt fails, the code creates the time zone and writes information about it to the text file. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone/cs/System.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone/vb/System.TimeZone2.CreateTimeZone.vb#4)]

summary.span: 傳回目前 物件的顯示名稱。

span.span: Returns the current object's display name.

returns.span: 目前 物件的 屬性值。

span.span: The value of the property of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指派的集合包含物件清單控制項，例如控制項，控制項自動呼叫方法來擷取描述每個物件，表示清單中的字串。When assigning a collection that contains objects to a list control such as the control, the control automatically calls the method to extract a string that describes each object to be represented in the list. 如此一來，您不需要儲存為字串時，物件的有意義的描述，使用者不需要使用該字串從集合中擷取物件。As a result, you do not need to store a meaningful description of the object as a string, and the user does not need to use that string to extract the object from the collection. 請參閱[如何： 列舉時區存在電腦上](~/docs/standard/datetime/enumerate-time-zones.md)如需詳細資訊。See [How to: Enumerate Time Zones Present on a Computer](~/docs/standard/datetime/enumerate-time-zones.md) for more detail.

summary.span: 取得代表國際標準時間 (UTC) 時區的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) zone.

value.span: 代表國際標準時間 (UTC) 時區的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是內建的物件。此資訊物件不會從登錄擷取。This is a built-in object; information about this object is not retrieved from the registry. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您一定要存取國際標準時間 (UTC) 時區透過屬性，而不是指派至 UTC 時區為準物件變數。You should always access the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) zone through the property rather than assigning the UTC time zone to a object variable. 這可防止物件變數，使其免於無效的呼叫所方法。This prevents the object variable from being invalidated by a call to the method. 國際標準時間已先前已知為格林威治標準時間 (GMT)。Coordinated Universal Time was previously known as Greenwich Mean Time (GMT). ## Examples 下列範例會擷取物件，代表國際標準時間 (UTC)，並將其顯示名稱、 標準時間名稱和日光節約時間名稱的輸出。The following example retrieves a object that represents Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and outputs its display name, standard time name, and daylight saving time name. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/CS/TimeZone2_Examples.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.Class/VB/TimeZone2_Examples.vb#3)]
